description:
In my file, I see this error message:
  nose.selector: INFO: /home/oubiwann/lab/OpenStack/nova/nova/tests/test_linux_net.py is executable; skipped

The perms need to be set properly on that file. Not sure if it's just in my repo or not, so I'm filing this bug, just in case.
title: Nose does not test nova/tests/test_linux_net.py
